entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
